detail_desc: Loafers with tassels at the front, satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 4.5 cm.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Straps with buttons at the front, elastication at the sides, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with patch pockets.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with long raglan sleeves with a decorative hole pattern down the outside and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with terry hearts, a button on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lightly padded cups, a seam at the waist and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Round opening with a decorative drawstring at the back and an asymmetric hem at the back.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and patch front pockets. One-button fastening at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Jacket in soft, thermal fleece that can be worn as a protective mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Boxy jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high polo-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.
Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper for a dog in a jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a metallic finish and turned-up hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with raw roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short slip dress in a viscose weave with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a low-cut back. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a woven shirt front. Collar, button placket and extra-deep armholes for easier nursing access.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow shoulder straps that cross and the back, and ties at the back.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting-colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with long sleeves, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Partly lined.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with a unique nursing feature. Small stand-up collar and short sleeves with a decorative tab and button. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Covered block heels 7.5 cm.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Trousers in washed, stretch twill. High waist with a detachable belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.

Coat in soft bouclé made from a wool blend in a gently rounded shape that tapers to the hem. Notch lapels, buttons down the front and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 17x25 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with long sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication at the top and short sleeves with flounced trims. Flounce at the top and hem and a visible zip at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton with a motif and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cropped cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a deep V-neck, large buttons down the front and wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Wide legs with rounded hems.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Real side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Dress with a lace bodice, short cap sleeves and a lower neckline at the back with visible buttons and a detachable satin bow. Seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Loose-knit, mohair-blend jumper in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Wide, calf-length skirt in silk with a high waist and concealed elastication at the sides.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Some of the polyester content of the joggers is recycled. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist that can be folded down, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.

Wide trousers in a crêpe weave with sequined embroidery. Extended waistband at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and a concealed zip with a button. Regular waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill trim around the neckline and at the cuffs, long raglan sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, round-necked dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs.
